resources.string: Use only test data while running ARO Data Collector.
ARO Data Collector STARTED! \n\nPlease navigate to the application you would like to test. When completed testing your application, please return to ARO to stop the ARO Data Collector.

Built from Public code supplied by 
 AT&T Developer Program 
 
 http://developer.att.com/aro
SD card is either not available or it is mounted. Please check the SD card before running ARO-Data Collector.
SD Card mounted,ARO Data Collector trace session terminated.
ARO Data Collector failed to start!
ARO Data Collector trace collection stopped.
ARO Data Collector trace session can\'t be started on flight mode.
ARO Data Collector trace session can\'t be started with both wifi and mobile turned off.
SD Card memory full, stopping ARO Data Collector.
Trace folder name should not have special characters or space.
Trace folder already exists ! Do you want to overwrite traces ?
ARO Data Collector trace session terminated. Changing network type automatically terminates trace session.
WIFI Signal Lost. Change of network type automatically terminates trace session.
